entries.meaning: (mathematics) The transpose of the respective cofactor matrix, for a given matrix. One of the factors in calculating the inverse of a matrix. Commonly notated as adj(A), where A is the given matrix.

verbs.description: adjugate (third-person singular simple present adjugates, present participle adjugating, simple past and past participle adjugated)

entries.meaning: (obsolete) To yoke an animal to something
